articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Sri Lankan Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Sri Lankan Ambassador
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Karunasena Kodituwakku, Sri Lankan ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday to mark the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and officials and labor innovators of the institutions, factories and enterprises in Pyongyang.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said Kim Jong Il's first field guidance to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the KPA on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) was a historic event which heralded his successful succession of the cause of the Songun revolution and his start of the Songun leadership.
					
					 He recorded the immortal Songun revolutionary history till the last moments of his life since the day when he started the Songun revolutionary leadership, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il, who regarded it as his lifelong mission to carry forward and accomplish the cause of the Juche revolution which was pioneered by dint of arms, acquired a deep insight into the requirements of the rapidly changing times and the developing revolution and comprehensively systematized the Songun idea through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He established the state machinery with the National Defence Commission as a pivot which applied the principles of the Songun revolution and made sure that all fields were reformed and adjusted as required by Songun, thereby providing a firm political and institutional guarantee for realizing the Songun cause.
					
					 He put forward the KPA and wisely led all service personnel and people despite the grim ordeals of the revolution, firmly defending Korean-style socialism established by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He provided the powerful political and military guarantee for the independent development of the nation, laid economic and cultural foundation, effected a great turn in socialist construction and thus clearly proved the truth that if one takes a firm hold on arms, one can build a worldwide powerful country.
					
					 He strengthened the driving force of the Songun revolution, turned the DPRK into the invincible politico-ideological power and laid a strong foundation for it to make a leap forward toward a socialist economic giant and highly civilized power.
					
					 He ushered in the June 15 era of reunification advancing in the idea of By Our Nation Itself and firmly defended the peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world, making great contributions to realizing the cause of human independence.
					
					 He most perfectly settled the issue of the succession of leadership and gave steady continuity to the Songun revolution and made our army and people be blessed by the illustrious leaders generation after generation. This is the greatest feat he performed for the eternal prosperity of the powerful Paektusan nation.
					
					 His Songun revolutionary idea and feats are being successfully carried forward and developed by the respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The reporter called for firmly protecting the sovereignty and dignity of the country and bringing earlier the final victory of the cause of building a socialist power, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Party.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Learns about Production in Metal Industrial Field in North Hamgyong Province
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Learns about Production in Metal Industrial Field in North Hamgyong Province
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the metal industrial field in North Hamgyong Province.
					 Going round the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, the Chongjin Steel Plant, the Puryong Ferroalloy Factory and the Musan Mining Complex, he learned in detail about production and capacity expansion projects.
					
					 He held consultative meetings of officials concerned there.
					
					 The meetings underscored the importance of duties assumed by the metal industrial field in implementing the strategic line of building an economic power set forth by the Party, and discussed issues of further expanding the achievements made by factories and enterprises in the field in putting production processes on a Juche and modern basis. 
					
					 Measures were taken to increase the production of iron and steel on the basis of modern science and technology, keep equipment for mining and conveying ores in full operation and providing quality electricity nonstop. 
					
					 The premier also toured Hoeryong City, the Ranam Coal-mining Machine Complex and the Kyongsong Insulator Factory.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Meets New Sri Lankan Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Meets New Sri Lankan Ambassador
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho had a talk with new Sri Lankan Ambassador to the DPRK Karunasena Kodituwakku who paid a courtesy call on him Wednesday.

articles.title: DPRK FM Delegation Meets Guinean Minister of Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
DPRK FM Delegation Meets Guinean Minister of Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots 
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry headed by Department Director Ho Yong Bok who visited the Republic of Guinea met and had a talk with Makale Camara, minister of Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots of Guinea, on Aug. 22.
					 The director said that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il extended unselfish support and solidarity to the struggle for building a new society in Guinea.
					
					 The director stressed the need to develop the relations between the two countries on a higher stage in the future.
					
					 Makale Camara said that the relations between Guinea and the DPRK were special ones with a long history and tradition provided by the preceding leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Makale Camara went on:
					
					 The two countries have developed the friendly and cooperative relations in the politics, economy, culture and all other fields and these relations have been maintained today.
					
					 Makale Camara expressed the will to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries and further strengthen support and solidarity with the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, talks between Ho Yong Bok and the secretary general of Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Overseas Compatriots of Guinea were held on the same day.
					
					 Exchanged at the talks were beneficial views on the issue of boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition and other issues of mutual concern.
					
					 During the visit to Guinea the director separately met with the minister of Agriculture and the minister of Commerce of Guinea and had conversations for developing the bilateral relations in various fields.

articles.title: Dancing Party of Officials, Members of Women's Union Held
articles.content:
Dancing Party of Officials, Members of Women's Union Held
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of officials and members of the women's union took place at the plaza of the Arch of Triumph on Wednesday on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The dancing party began with song "Glory to General".
					
					 They danced to the tunes of such songs as "Ongheya of Songun Victory", expressing boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il who made unremitting devotion and efforts to put forward the Korean people as the most proud people in the world.
					
					 They danced to the tunes of such songs as "Ongheya" reflecting the happiness and pride of the Korean women who push one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot, revving up the atmosphere.

articles.title: Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visit Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
articles.content:
Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Visit Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition on Wednesday on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 They looked round photos dealing with immortal feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, their works and DPRK books.
					
					 They watched a video showing the will of the army and people of the DPRK to surely win a final victory in the confrontation with U.S. led- imperialism.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Observes Important Day of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Observes Important Day of DPRK
 Chongjin, August 24 (KCNA) -- There was a meeting of foreign crewmen at Chongjin Port on Wednesday to observe the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City before paying tribute to them.
					
					 The meeting was attended by the captain and crewmen of the Jamaica-flagged ship New Global.
					
					 The speakers said the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il was a great political mode that helped not only protect the destiny of a country and a nation but also successfully build a new independent world and peaceful world.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is boundlessly revered by the Korean people and other world progressives as a peerlessly elder statesman, genius of creation and construction, lodestar of national reunification and outstanding leader of the cause of human independence for the distinguished exploits he performed on the road of his Songun revolutionary leadership, they noted.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would open up a new phase of national reunification under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the great idea and noble intention of the preceding leaders.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 They were handed over to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese Embassy here Zhang Ping who is doyen of the military attaches corps on Wednesday.

articles.title: Participants in 9th Congress of Youth League Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Participants in 9th Congress of Youth League Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They paid homage to the great leaders at the halls where they lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Participants in 9th Congress of Youth League Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in 9th Congress of Youth League Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They toured the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Museum. At the old home, they looked round historical relics, recollecting the noble careers of the President and his patriotic and revolutionary family members in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They also went to the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and made bows to her.
					
					 They placed a wreath and bunches of flowers at the wreath-laying stand and observed a moment's silence in memory of revolutionary martyrs.
					
					 They went round the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" and observed a moment's silence in memory of the hero soldiers.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visit to Russia
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Visit to Russia
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association hosted a reception at Okryu Restaurant on Wednesday on the 15th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's visit to the Russia and the 5th anniversary of his visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern Regions.
					 Present there on invitation were Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, and officials of his embassy.
					
					 It was attended by Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, Wednesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the Day of Songun. 
					 She laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Saitama Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity led by Secretary General Shimada Gazuhiko visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home of the President, the members of the delegation looked round historical relics preserved with much care, being briefed on the President's revolutionary history and patriotic careers of his family members.
					
					 They also toured the Tower of the Juche Idea, Sci-tech Complex and Central Zoo.

articles.title: Japanese Figure Denounces Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Japanese Figure Denounces Ulji Freedom Guardian 
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Gazuhiko Shimada, secretary general of the Saitama Prefectural Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity, on a visit to the DPRK was interviewed by KCNA on Wednesday as regards the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises against the DPRK kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces.
					 The secretary general vehemently denounced the joint military exercises kicked off again by the U.S. creating a serious danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and extremely screwing up the tension.
					
					 The U.S. is undisguisedly staging the military exercises simulating the direct nuclear attack on the DPRK, the secretary general said, and went on:
					
					 This year, too, the U.S. and south Korean authorities started the frantic military exercises on Aug. 22.
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian is a military maneuver targeting the DPRK from A to Z.
					
					 The U.S. has already deployed nuclear strategic bombers on Guam and seeks to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 Nuclear crisis on the Korean peninsula was spawned by the U.S. nuclear weapons in south Korea, not by the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. nuclear weapons should be withdrawn from south Korea to ensure peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Sovereignty is wantonly being violated by the shameless U.S. inference into internal affairs and military maneuvers in other countries and regions.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive displeased with peace on the peninsula should come to herself.
					
					 The Japanese government should make a switchover in the policy towards the DPRK and resume dialogue as soon as possible to normalize diplomatic relations with the DPRK in accordance with the Japan-DPRK Pyongyang Declaration, not following the U.S. creating a crisis on the peninsula.
					
					 We condemn the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises against the DPRK.

articles.title: Explosives Proving U.S. Imperialists' Crimes Found in Kaesong City of DPRK
articles.content:
Explosives Proving U.S. Imperialists' Crimes Found in Kaesong City of DPRK
 Kaesong, August 24 (KCNA) -- Various type explosives disclosing massacres committed by the U.S. imperialists were found in Kaesong, a DPRK city near the Military Demarcation Line.
					 Of late, dozens of U.S.-made butterfly bombs, mortar shells and grenades were found in the area near the project for remodeling the Janamsan Pleasure Ground.
					
					 The butterfly bombs were identified as the ones dropped by the U.S. imperialist air bandits in a bid to completely destroy the historical and cultural relics in areas of Kaesong including Nam Gate during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Several grenades were found in the site for remodeling the Kaesong Plaza.
					
					 More than half a century has passed since the ceasefire but the explosives dropped by the U.S. imperialists are still threatening lives and properties of the Korean people.
					
					 Photos of the newly found explosives are displayed at the Kaesong City House of Class Education.

articles.title: Songun Brilliant Commanders and 105th Tank Division
articles.content:
Songun Brilliant Commanders and 105th Tank Division
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- August 25 is the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il began his Songun revolutionary leadership with the inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on August 25, Juche 49 (1960).
					
					 Inspecting the unit together with President Kim Il Sung that day, Kim Jong Il said:
					
					 "Let Us Defend With Our Very Lives the Party Central Committee Headed by the Respected Comrade Kim Il Sung!"?This Slogan Should Be Held Higher by the People's Army.
					
					 It was early in December 2006 that he visited the unit for the 22nd time. At that time, Kim Jong Il called on the unit to always demonstrate its honor, noting that the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division had been a guards unit strong not only during the war but in the ideological aspect.
					
					 Early in January 2010, the unit was honored to be inspected by Kim Jong Un, another Songun brilliant commander, together with Kim Jong Il.
					
					 That day, Kim Jong Un personally drove the tank No. 951 at full speed and hit the target, which was a clear manifestation of his firm will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche with the might of the Paektusan army.
					
					 And he also visited the unit on the first day of the year 2012, shortly after the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: New Microorganism Fertilizer Widely Accepted in DPRK
articles.content:
New Microorganism Fertilizer Widely Accepted in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- A method for producing green manure fermented with blue-green algae has been widely introduced by various agricultural units in the DPRK.
					 The method is welcomed, in particular, by rural communities in the west coastal area for its low cost and high effectiveness.
					
					 In recent years, organic fermentation has been promoted with the increase of the content of humic acid and soluble nutritive elements in soils mucked with the green manure, according to an analysis.
					
					 The manure helps raise the capacity of fixing nitrogen.

articles.title: Patent Agro-technological Inventions in Wide Use
articles.content:
Patent Agro-technological Inventions in Wide Use
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Patent agro-technological inventions have been widely applied to farming in the DPRK.
					 One of them is a plant activator promoting the growth of crops and raising their yield. 
					
					 The activator, with molybdate as its main composition, is rich in microelements like manganese, iron, zinc and sodium.
					
					 It has proved very effective in accelerating the growth of grains, vegetables, industrial crops, bean crops and root crops as well as flowering plants and fruit trees.

articles.title: Taedonggang Beer Popular among DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
Taedonggang Beer Popular among DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Taedonggang Beer Festival is going on with large attendance in the DPRK, enjoying great popularity.
					 Kim Song Il, a resident in Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang, told KCNA:
					
					 Taedonggang beer is the best. I had been to many countries for scores of years and tasted different beers famous in the world. But no beer can match the Taedonggang beer, I think.
					
					 I like dark beer containing five percent alcohol.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, an artist of the Korean April 26 Cartoon Film Studio, said that he is not a beer fan but often drinks the Taedonggang beer, adding:
					
					 It is my opinion that as the beer is brewed with water of the River Taedong, barley of South Hwanghae Province and hops of Ryanggang Province as its main raw materials, it is very excellent.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Traitors' Military Nexus with Sworn Enemy Japan
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Blasts S. Korean Traitors' Military Nexus with Sworn Enemy Japan 
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- South Korea and Japan are tightening their military nexus.
					 The south Korean puppet group has been frequently closeted with the Japanese military bosses who visited south Korea to pursue confrontation with the DPRK. It decided to expand the military exchange and cooperation such as conclusion of an agreement on the protection of the military information with Japan, establishment of more hotlines between the defence authorities, inspection of the military drills and mutual visits of aircrafts and warships on several occasions such as the "2016 Asia security meeting".
					
					 They resumed the south Korean puppet Navy's training flotilla's entrance into Japanese ports, which had been stopped over the past five years and are stepping up the establishment of the system of sharing information among the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces' ever more undisguised military nexus with Japan is not just the simple military and diplomatic act but a challenge to the desire of the compatriots to settle accounts with Japan for its past crimes without fail and thrice-cursed treacherous one of opening the way for the sworn enemy of the Korean nation to launch reinvasion.
					
					 Japan which had committed the unprecedented crimes after occupying Korea in the last century still work with bloodshot eyes to reinvade Korea, denying the admission, apology and reparation for its past crimes.
					
					 The Korean peninsula is the first target of Japan's exercise of the "right to collective self-defense".
					
					 In particular, Japan which provided a springboard for openly advancing to the Korean peninsula with the amendment of the "U.S.-Japan defense cooperation guidelines" set the DPRK as the first target, talking about the "automatic involvement of the "Self-Defense Forces' in emergency".
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' ambition to occupy the Korean peninsula again and reduce the Korean nation into its colonial slaves has reached the phase which can no longer be overlooked.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the south Korean puppet group, steeped in pro-Japanese flunkeyism, is kowtowing to the Japanese reactionaries, far from protesting against their moves for revival of militarism and reinvasion.  In her "address marking August 15" Park Geun Hye underlined the need to "turn south Korea-Japan relations into future-oriented ones."
					
					 It is none other than the south Korean group of traitors who act even a guide for reinvasion in order to do harm to the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Neither detente on the Korean peninsula nor the security and peace of the nation can be achieved as long as the Park group persisting in depending on foreign forces and escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north is allowed to go scot-free.
					
					 It is necessary to wipe out all the pro-Japanese sycophantic traitors of south Korea in order to prevent the bitter lesson of statelessness from being repeated. It is the warning of history.

articles.title: Minju Joson Blasts Ulji Freedom Guardian
articles.content:
Minju Joson Blasts Ulji Freedom Guardian
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drill being staged by the U.S. imperialist warmongers and the south Korean puppet regime is an extremely dangerous nuclear war exercise to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, comments Minju Joson Wednesday.
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 They are describing Ulji Freedom Guardian as "a regular and open exercise" and "a normal exercise whose transparency is ensured" in a crafty attempt to cover up the aggressive nature and danger of the muscle flexing, but it is nothing but a chicanery to mislead the public opinion.
					
					 No matter what rhetoric they may use to hide the aggressive nature of the military drill, they can never justify the above-said claim. The reason is that involved in the on-going saber-rattling are U.S. forces of all services and special warfare groups and south Korean forces and all military and civil means including civil fishing boats and planes. Another reason is that it is being staged pursuant to the "operation for eliminating" the headquarters of our revolution and the adventurous operation plan aimed to "occupy Pyongyang".
					
					 Ulji Freedom Guardian goes to prove that "threat from the north" and peace touted by the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye regime are no more than a fig-leaf for concealing the true colors as aggressors and war provocateurs.
					
					 The world will witness what a miserable end the warmongers will meet.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Deliberately Blowing up Ukishima-maru
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Deliberately Blowing up Ukishima-maru
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The defeated Japanese imperialists on August 24, 1945 blew up the ship carrying many Koreans who were going back home, immensely pleased with the country's liberation. 
					 This is the Ukishima-maru explosion incident recorded in history.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article says that the incident was not a simple sinking incident but a deliberate massacre. 
					
					 This was indisputably proved by the whole course of the incident, testimonies made by survivors and materials surveyed and discovered so far, the article says, adding: 
					
					 Right after the occurrence of the incident, the Japanese authorities hastily made public the "results of survey" which said that the incident was an "accidental and inevitable one caused by a mine placed by U.S. forces in a bid to cover up the truth behind the incident.
					
					 This was no more than a sheer distortion of the historical truth and, at the same time, the height of crafty and shameless nature peculiar to Japan. 
					
					 From the viewpoint of international law and humanitarian stand and in the light of the reason why Korean people were forced to go to Japan, the incident is absolutely an unpardonable and unethical crime.
					
					 History does not know well about such brutes as the Japanese imperialists who committed the massacres even after their defeat, not content with mercilessly killing people of different countries and driving them like beasts of burden during the whole period of their colonial rule.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will surely force Japan to pay a very high price for all sorts of misfortune and pain the Koreans suffered in the past at the hands of the Japanese imperialists.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye Group of Vociferating about "Effective Sanctions against North"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye Group of Vociferating about "Effective Sanctions against North"
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group of south Korea are so foolish as to vociferate about "effective sanctions against the north". They are blustering that "sanctions" slapped by them together with outsiders prove effective, floating sheer lies about the reality of the DPRK.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 It is ridiculous that the Park group, keen on escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north, are busy with false propaganda, suffering from hallucinations about "effective sanctions against the north".
					
					 The "effective sanctions against the north" touted by the puppet forces are no more than a wild rumor spread by the fools utterly ignorant of their rival.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' persistent "sanctions" against the DPRK are aimed at shaking the faith of its army and people in socialism and finally bringing down its dignified social system.
					
					 No "sanctions" by hostile forces can work on the DPRK. Its service personnel and people have strong consciousness of independence and spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 Nothing is more foolish and stupid than calculating the hostile forces will pull down such fortress of independence and invulnerable bulwark through such "sanctions".
					
					 The puppet forces' persistent "sanctions" against the DPRK will only lead to disgrace and ruin.
					
					 The Park group's trumpeting about "effective sanctions against the north" only sounds like a dirge for those whose days are numbered.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Stop Acting Rashly
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Stop Acting Rashly 
  Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary says the Japanese reactionaries are making desperate efforts to deploy THAAD while floating the story about "missile threat" under the pretext of the DPRK's rocket launch.
					 Their false propaganda against the DPRK is no more than sheer sophism, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 If Japan is concerned for the detente in the region even a bit, it should pay attention to the U.S. staging madcap war exercises for aggression against the DPRK by introducing into south Korea its armed forces enough to fight a war.
					
					 This being a hard reality, Japan is seeking an ulterior aim. Its scenario is to realize its ambition for overseas aggression by putting spurs to the process for converting Japan into a military giant with the backing of the U.S.
					
					 We would like to warn Japan once again that its reinvasion will lead to ruin.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries had better bear this in mind and stop foolish acts. This would do Japan good either.
					
					 We would like to warn the U.S., too. It may get into trouble for patronizing Japan which does not abandon its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to cope with threat posed by its henchmen before talking about someone's "threat".

articles.title: Minju Joson Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime of Glossing over Sexual Slavery Issue
articles.content:
Minju Joson Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime of Glossing over Sexual Slavery Issue
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye regime of traitors, touting "implementation" of the humiliating "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, decided to get a petty amount of money paid by the Japanese reactionaries deposited in the recently established "fund for reconciliation and recovery." 
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary terms this an insult and mockery of the victims of the sexual slavery and all other Koreans.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against the Korean nation in the past are thrice-cursed ones that should never be pardoned for all ages.
					
					The hideous crimes the Japanese brutes committed by forcing 200,000 Korean women into sexual slavery and thus inflicting mental and physical pain upon them before killing them are the worst human rights abuses, for which Japan should make an apology and reparation generation after generation.
					
					 However, the Park group of traitors is working hard to gloss over the issue of sexual slavery for a paltry amount of money, far from forcing Japan to make an apology. This is, indeed, another high treason mocking and insulting the sexually abused hundreds of thousands of Korean women and the dignity of the nation.
					
					 The above-said decision made by the Park group is a risky move against the country and nation to inflict greater misfortune and pain upon all Koreans by forming the triangular military alliance involving the U.S., Japan and south Korea, as instructed by its master U.S.
					
					 The Park group is bound to meet severe punishment by the nation for its high treason.

articles.title: Japan's Denial of Past Crimes under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Denial of Past Crimes under Fire
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Japan is getting ever more undisguised in its false propaganda to hide the crimes related to the sexual slavery, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 It was disclosed on August 20 that the Foreign Ministry of Japan posted an English article denying the forcible drafting of women as sexual slaves on its website.
					
					 The article contains the reckless remarks made by a counseling official of the ministry during discussion at the meeting of the UN Committee on the Elimination of Discrimination against Women held in February last. 
					
					 In April a Cabinet secretaries office opened a Japanese and English website on which the brigandish assertion that Tok Islets belong to Japan is posted.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' imprudent act of denying the past crimes and concrete facts recognized by the world is attributable to the undisguised pro-Japanese act of the Park Geun Hye group in south Korea.

articles.title: Stop to UFG Joint Military Drill Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to UFG Joint Military Drill Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea released a commentary on Aug. 22 censuring the U.S. and the south Korean war maniacs' Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 Noting OPLAN 5015 aimed at a preemptive attack on the north will be applied to the drill, the commentary said the possibility of an armed clash is increasing on the Korean peninsula due to the war rehearsal.
					
					  It went on:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities are claiming that U.S. strategic weaponry will not be deployed on the peninsula, terming the drill "annual and defensive one."
					
					 But the "tailored deterrence strategy" and the "4D operation plan" aimed at a preemptive attack on the north in contingency, which will be applied to the drill, are not defensive at all but offensive.
					
					 Recalling the U.S. staged muscle-flexing by getting its strategic bombers forward-deployed on Guam for sorties, the commentary queried whether the drill launched against that backdrop can be termed defensive.
					
					 Noting it is going to deploy THAAD under the pretext of "north's counteraction", it said this can never help defuse the danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula.
					
					 It urged the regime to present a policy for halting Ulji Freedom Guardian, though belatedly, in order to bring about a phase of repairing the frozen south-north ties and creating the atmosphere for achieving durable peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: Halt to Ulji Freedom Guardian Demanded by S. Korean Body
articles.content:
Halt to Ulji Freedom Guardian Demanded by S. Korean Body
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Labor Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on August 22 denouncing Ulji Freedom Guardian kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					 The statement said that before UFG the U.S. deployed nuclear strategic bombers and nuclear submarines around the Korean peninsula and put them on emergency alert.
					
					 The saber-rattling which started pursuant to such war plans as "4D operation plan" includes even a biological war drill, the greatest concern of the international community, it charged.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop at once Ulji Freedom Guardian, roll back the hostile policy toward the DPRK and opt for dialogue with it.

articles.title: Koreans in Europe Call for Protecting National Security through Joint Conference
articles.content:
Koreans in Europe Call for Protecting National Security through Joint Conference
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany on Aug. 22 made public an appeal titled "Let's successfully hold a joint conference for independence and peaceful reunification and thus protect the life and security of the nation forever".
					 The appeal condemned America's stooges, the south Korean authorities, for kicking off the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercise pursuant to OPLAN 5015 under the signboard of "annual defensive exercise" that day despite the public opposition at home and abroad and the north's warning.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The hostile policy towards the DPRK and treacherous remarks aimed to unleash a nuclear war has reached an unpardonable stage. This stirred up the indignation among all Koreans.
					
					 The forces involved in the military exercise which was opened to the public show how dangerous the military drill is.
					
					 Peace champions of the world are aware through the situation on the peninsula that as long as there are the U.S. imperialists in the world, it is impossible to achieve peace for mankind.
					
					 It is the only way of averting a war on the Korean peninsula and achieving the independence and peaceful reunification of the country to successfully hold the joint conference for greater unity through the implementation of the July 4 joint statement, June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Photos Displayed at Russian Hydro-electric Plant and Railway Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Photos Displayed at Russian Hydro-electric Plant and Railway Station
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's photos were displayed with due ceremony on Aug. 19 at the Bureya Hydro-electric Plant and Bureya Railway Station on the 5th anniversary of his visit to Siberian and Far Eastern Regions of the Russian Federation.
					 Present there were personages of the Amur Regional Government, Bureya District, Bureya Hydro-electric Plant and Bureya Railway Station and other masses and officials of the DPRK mission.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the monument inscribed with autograph of Kim Jong Il at the plant and a tablet to honor him at the railway station before paying tribute to him.
					
					 Photos of Kim Jong Il enjoying a bird's-eye view of the plant and going round it were displayed at the room visited by him and the railway station building.
					
					 That day there were joint events such as tree planting, Korean book, photo and art exhibition at the relevant units to observe the fifth anniversary his visit to the hydro-electric plant and railway station.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Romanian Political Party
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted by the New Socialist Party of Romania on its website Juche Idea on Aug. 20.
					 The work published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013) deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Nepal
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Who Are Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics on Aug. 20 on the occasion of the 9th Congress of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Youth Day.
					 The work published on Sept. 18, Juche 103 (2014) says that the Korean youth have covered glorious path while performing heroic feats and winning proud victory through many years of the revolution under the wise leadership and benevolent loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks for the Korean youth to successfully fulfill the role as young vanguard of the Party in the present historic advance and ways for doing so.

articles.title: Myanmar Political Party Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Myanmar Political Party Sends Floral Basket to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar sent a floral basket to the DPRK Eembassy in Myanmar on Aug. 19 on the 56th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The floral basket was laid before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK's Day of Songun Observed in Benin, Nigeria
articles.content:
DPRK's Day of Songun Observed in Benin, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Benin and Nigeria on Aug. 19 on the DPRK's Day of Songun.
					 They included a reading session on leader Kim Jong Il's work by the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and a Korean book and photo exhibition by the Parida Hospital in Zamfara State, Nigeria.
					
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 At the reading session on Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-Based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution", speakers lauded Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership exploits.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for Panmunjom Mission of KPA Supported by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for Panmunjom Mission of KPA Supported by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, August 24 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Aug. 18 in support of a statement issued by a spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army.
					 The statement said:
					
					 On Aug. 18, 1976, the U.S. imperialists committed a grave military provocation against the DPRK in the joint security area of Panmunjom.
					
					 Such military provocation which was recorded in history as the Panmunjom incident led the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war.
					
					 The spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the KPA clarified in a statement that an officer of the U.S. imperialist aggression army who was commanding the provocation operation had his neck hit by an axe which had been thrown to KPA soldiers.
					
					 The U.S. is inviting ruin as it is persistently resorting to the moves for a war against the DPRK, far from drawing a lesson from the incident.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists should not forget that the U.S. would be the first to be reduced to ashes by a preemptive nuclear strike to be mounted by the KPA if they ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 If they ignite the second Korean War, they are bound to meet miserable ruin. The U.S. ruin is the law that governs the development of history.
					
					 We fully support the statement issued by the spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas de credenciales de nuevo embajador de Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas de credenciales de nuevo embajador de Sri Lanka
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Karunasena Kodituwakku presento este miercoles en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae ante Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sus cartas credenciales que le acreditan como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					   Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: Acto central por 56o aniversario de inicio de direccion del Songun de Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Acto central por 56o aniversario de inicio de direccion del Songun de Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 56o aniversario del inicio de la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros del organo de direccion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, funcionarios e innovadores laborales de organismos, fabricas y empresas de esta capital.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del Ejercito Popular de Corea Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC. 
					
					El 25 de agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente inspecciono la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del EPC, lo cual fue un acontecimiento historico que declaro la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria del Songun y el inicio de la direccion del Songun, dijo el informante y continuo:
					
					Desde el primer dia de su orientacion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun hasta el ultimo periodo de su vida, el Dirigente escribio la inmortal cronica revolucionaria del Songun.
					
					Al presentar como su mision de toda la vida el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada con las fuerzas armadas, se percato profundamente de la demanda de la epoca en cambio brusco y de la revolucion en desarrollo y sistematizo globalmente la idea del Songun con sus energicas actividades ideo-teoricas.
					
					Establecio el sistema de aparato de Estado centrado en la defensa nacional que materializo el principio de la revolucion del Songun e hizo reestructurar todos los dominios de acuerdo con la demanda del Songun, de modo que preparo la firme garantia politica e institucional para el cumplimiento de la causa del Songun.
					
					Cada vez que la revolucion coreana tropezaba con severas pruebas, condujo sabiamente a los militares y civiles poniendo al frente el Ejercito Popular y asi defendio con firmeza el socialismo coreano construido por el Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Preparo la poderosa garantia politico-militar y la base economico-cultural para el desarrollo independiente de la nacion y logro un gran viraje en la construccion socialista, de manera que confirmo claramente la verdad de que se puede levantar una potencia de talla mundial en cualesquier adversidades si dan prioridad a las fuerzas armadas. 
					
					Tambien, consolido el sujeto de la revolucion del Songun, convirtio la RPDC en la invicta potencia ideo-politica y asento la firme base para desarrollar la patria como potencia economica y civilizada socialista. 
					
					Abrio la era de reunificacion del 15 de Junio que marchaba bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y defendio con firmeza la paz y la seguridad de Asia y el resto del mundo haciendo gran aporte al cumplimiento de la causa de la independencia de la humanidad. 
					
					Al resolver mas perfectamente el problema de sucesion de la direccion, dio firme continuidad a la revolucion del Songun e hizo al ejercito y pueblo coreanos gozar generacion tras generacion de la fortuna de tener al gran lider y gran general, lo cual es la proeza mas notable del Dirigente realizada por la prosperidad eterna de la potencia Paektusan. 
					
					La idea y las proezas revolucionarias del Songun del Dirigente continuan satisfactoriamente hoy por el Presidente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Todos tienen que defender firmemente la soberania y dignidad del pais y adelantar la victoria final de la causa de construccion de la potencia socialista, en acato a la orientacion del Partido sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju dirige la rama de industria metalurgica de Hamgyong del Norte
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju dirige la rama de industria metalurgica de Hamgyong del Norte
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Pak Pong Ju averiguo en el terreno las labores de la rama de la industria metalurgica de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte.
					Recorriendo el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek, la Aceria de Chongjin, la Fabrica de Hierro de Aleacion de Puryong y el Complejo de Minas de Musan, se entero en detalles de la produccion y de la ampliacion de capacidad productiva. 
					
					En las reuniones consultivas de los funcionarios interesados realizados en el terreno, se dio enfasis en la importancia de la mision de la rama de la industria metalurgica en materializar la linea estrategica del Partido sobre la construccion de una potencia economica y se discutieron los problemas para amplificar mas los exitos de las fabricas y empresas alcanzados en la jucheanizacion y la modernizacion de los procesos productivos. 
					
					Se tomaron las medidas para aumentar la produccion de materiales de hierro y acero a base de las ciencias y tecnicas modernas, asegurar el pleno funcionamiento de los equipos de extraccion y transporte de minerales y suministrar ininterrumpidamente la electricidad de buena calidad. 
					
					Por otra parte, el premier dio vueltas por la ciudad de Hoeryong, el Complejo de Maquinas de Minas de Carbon de Ranam, la Fabrica de Aisladores de Kyongsong y otros lugares.

articles.title: Canciller coreano se reune con nuevo embajador de Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Canciller coreano se reune con nuevo embajador de Sri Lanka
Pyongyang, 24 de agosto (ACNC) -- El canciller coreano Ri Yong Ho departio este miercoles con el nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka en Corea, Karunasena Kodituwakku quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.
